text: Evaṃ passaṃ bhikkhave sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati vedanāyapi nibbindati saññāyapi nibbindati saṅkhāresupi nibbindati viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati
edit: Evaṃ passaṃ bhikkhave sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati vedanāyapi nibbindati saññāyapi nibbindati saṅkhāresupi nibbindati viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati

translations.transtext: Monks, a noble disciple, having heard, seeing as such, gets wearied of form, feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness.
